Text:
correct me if am wrong ..

aac - 5.1 is not perfectly compatible with PS3 ..

instead ac3 5.1 is more acceptabel.. 

aac will be read and rendered only on HDMI audio output .. not in optical or anyother way

When the AAC-LC is wrapped in a .mp4 container, as it is with our releases, there is no issues. The high profile we use also insures comparability across the board with different players.
For the best experience, I would recommend using HDMI when you can.

I was monitoring for this...  As far as I could tell, you were the first to upload this title to the Web.  About 24 hours later, other torrents of this started to appear.

This isn't my favorite movie file type, but thank you.
